p:
Territory of Washington, County of Spokane}ss Territory of Washington, Plaintiff vs. Ray Raymond Defendant}ss In the District Court of the Territory of Washington, and for the Fourth Judicial District thereof, holding terms at Cheney Spokane Falls, Spokane County, in said.
To the Sheriff of Spokane County Greeting: In the Name of the United States, You are hereby commanded to summon Rufus Rima to be and appear before the District Court at the Court House, in Cheney Spokane Falls in said County, on the 13th day of December A.D. 1886 at 9 o'clock A.M. to there give evi dence in the above entitled cause on the part of said Territory.
Witness the Hon. George Turner, Associate Justice of the Supreme Court of Washington Territory, and Judge of said Court, and the Seal thereof affixed this 14th day of Dec. A.D. 1886. D.A. Clement Clerk By Deputy.
